<S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to it the <S%H7150>proclamation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am going to <S%H1696>tell<s%> you."

Then <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> through the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> day's <S%H4109>walk;<s%> and he <S%H7121>cried<s%> out and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5750>"Yet<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> will be <S%H2015>overthrown.<s%>"

When the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H5060>reached<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> he <S%H6965>arose<s%> from his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H5674>laid<s%> <S%H5674>aside<s%> his <S%H155>robe<s%> from him, <S%H3680>covered<s%> [himself] with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the <S%H665>ashes.<s%>

"But both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> must be <S%H3680>covered<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> and let men <S%H7121>call<s%> on <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2394>earnestly<s%> that <S%H376>each<s%> may <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H9567>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> and from the <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in his <S%H3709>hands.<s%>
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H3045>knows,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H7725>turn<s%> and <S%H5162>relent,<s%> and <S%H7725>withdraw<s%> His <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> so that we shall not perish?"
